readable.title: 3087485737_cb09bc80b6
readable.content: A man in blue shorts stands on a surfboard in shallow water . A man on a beach , with his foot on a boogie board . A man standing on the shore . A man wearing a blue bathing suit stands on a red surfboard at the beach . A young man with a Mohawk style haircut and surfer shorts stands on a boogie board at the beach .
